properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Baldwin, GA; Wilkinson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:11PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Milledgeville.
* From tomorrow early afternoon until further notice.
* At 9 PM Wednesday the stage was 23.7 feet, and falling.
* Minor flooding will continue.
* Flood stage is 22 feet.
* The river will fall, then rise to near 24.3 feet by early Friday morning.
* At 22 feet...Minor flooding occurs upstream and downstream from the gage
located around one half mile upstream from the Georgia Highway 22 and 24
bridge. Low lying portions of woodlands and pasture in the natural flood plain
will begin to flood. This will include portions of the sidewalks in the Oconee
River Greenway Park just downstream from the bridge. Sinclair Dam will have
one to two gates open to reach this height.
